name: On The Seabed v0.3
description:
Playtest Build, ask me before sending to someone else. It will be free on full release so I'll probably say yes. Controls: WASD to move, arrow keys to aim, space to attack, shift to use utility, 'r' to use special, 'q' to activate companion. When aim w/ mouse is on: right click to aim, left click to attack

MAKE SURE YOU'RE ON THE LATEST RELEASE.

And use the discussion board, it would really help me out.
